sentence.Network_en: The water above the continental shelf is moved by the tides and by estuarine currents.
sentence.Network_cn: 潮流和河口流使大陆架上的海水流动.

sentence.Network_en: An outstanding example of the drastic alteration of the estuarine environment is found in the Netherlands.
sentence.Network_cn: 河口湾环境发生强烈变化的一个突出的例子是荷兰.

sentence.Network_en: An evaluating index system is established for degenerated estuarine ecosystem restoration.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要建立了退化河口生态系统恢复评价指标体系.
